import React,{useState} from 'react' import "./AddFleets.css" import deli from "../src/deli.png" import {addFleet} from "../fleethelp/fleetapi" export default function AddFleets() { const [value,setValue] =useState({ name:"", phone:"" }) const {name,phone} = value const onDataHandler = name => event => { setValue({...value,[name]:event.target.value}) } const onAddDelivery = event => { event.preventDefault() addFleet({name,phone}).then(res => { console.log(res); setValue({name:"",phone:""}) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); }) } return (

Add Fleets

Add Delivery Here
Note that when you add the delivery boy, you should povide his/her phone number {name} {phone}
